articles.title: Gold rates jump in Hyderabad, near all-time high - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: Ahead of the US Federal Reserve's latest policy meeting, the rates of gold jumped in Hyderabad and other metro cities on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Hyderabad: Ahead of the US Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting due this week, the rates of gold jumped in Hyderabad and other metro cities on Tuesday.
